name: active-handles
description: Prints out information about the process's active handles, including function source and location

scripts.test-0.10: (cd ./node_modules/function-origin && nave use 0.10 node-gyp rebuild) && nave use 0.10 npm run test-main
scripts.test-0.12: (cd ./node_modules/function-origin && nave use 0.12 node-gyp rebuild) && nave use 0.12 npm run test-main
scripts.test-iojs: (cd ./node_modules/function-origin && nave use latest node-gyp rebuild) && nave use latest npm run test-main
scripts.test-all: npm run test-main && npm run test-0.10 && npm run test-0.12 && npm run test-iojs
scripts.test: if [ -e $TRAVIS ]; then (cd ./node_modules/function-origin && node-gyp rebuild) && npm run test-all; else npm run test-main; fi
